description: This Italian Restaurant offers classic Italian dishes with a focus on fresh ingredients. Enjoy traditional pasta and steak.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, these entrees are the main dishes.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A close-up photo of a traditional lasagna, layered with meat, bechamel, and cheese, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A plate of sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, presented at Italian Restaurant.
